sentence.text: Mutations in cellular response to DNA damage stimulus cause premature ageing and liver cancer in humans and mice; thus, defective DPC repair has great clinical ramifications.

entity.text: cellular response to DNA damage stimulus

sentence.text: Finally, we will discuss the negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II of faulty DPC repair on disease and cancer therapy

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
